title: Tamarind Mango Sangria
directions: Purée tamarind, water, sugar, and 1 1/2 cups mangoes in a blender until mixture is smooth. Pour through a medium-mesh sieve into a pitcher and stir in wine, tequila, grapes, and remaining cup mangoes. Chill, covered, until ready to serve, up to 24 hours. Serve over ice.
ingredients: 3/4 cup thawed frozen unsweetened tamarind purée
1 cup halved green and red seedless grapes
